00031 
00032 void SCTPAssociation::decreaseOutstandingBytes(SCTPDataVariables* chunk)
00033 {
00034     SCTPPathVariables* lastPath = chunk->getLastDestinationPath();
00035 
00036     assert(lastPath->outstandingBytes >= chunk->booksize);
00037     lastPath->outstandingBytes -= chunk->booksize;
00038     state->outstandingBytes -= chunk->booksize;
00039     assert((int64)state->outstandingBytes >= 0);
00040 
00041     chunk->countsAsOutstanding = false;
00042 
00043     CounterMap::iterator iterator = qCounter.roomRetransQ.find(lastPath->remoteAddress);
00044         iterator->second -= ADD_PADDING(chunk->booksize + SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH);
00045 
00046 }

00048 
00049 bool SCTPAssociation::process_RCV_Message(SCTPMessage*       sctpmsg,
00050                                                         const IPvXAddress& src,
00051                                                         const IPvXAddress& dest)
00052 {
00053     // ====== Header checks ==================================================
00054     sctpEV3 << getFullPath()  << " SCTPAssociationRcvMessage:process_RCV_Message"
00055               << " localAddr="  << localAddr
00056               << " remoteAddr=" << remoteAddr << endl;
00057     if ((sctpmsg->hasBitError() || !sctpmsg->getChecksumOk()))
00058     {
00059         if (((SCTPChunk*)(sctpmsg->getChunks(0)))->getChunkType() == INIT_ACK) {
00060             stopTimer(T1_InitTimer);
00061             sctpEV3 << "InitAck with bit-error. Retransmit Init" << endl;
00062             retransmitInit();
00063             startTimer(T1_InitTimer,state->initRexmitTimeout);
00064         }
00065         if (((SCTPChunk*)(sctpmsg->getChunks(0)))->getChunkType() == COOKIE_ACK) {
00066             stopTimer(T1_InitTimer);
00067             sctpEV3 << "CookieAck with bit-error. Retransmit CookieEcho" << endl;
00068             retransmitCookieEcho();
00069             startTimer(T1_InitTimer,state->initRexmitTimeout);
00070         }
00071     }
00072 
00073     SCTPPathVariables* path      = getPath(src);
00074     const int32  srcPort             = sctpmsg->getDestPort();
00075     const int32  destPort        = sctpmsg->getSrcPort();
00076     const uint32 numberOfChunks = sctpmsg->getChunksArraySize();
00077     sctpEV3 << "numberOfChunks=" <<numberOfChunks << endl;
00078 
00079     state->sctpmsg = (SCTPMessage*)sctpmsg->dup();
00080 
00081     // ====== Handle chunks ==================================================
00082     bool trans              = true;
00083     bool sendAllowed        = false;
00084     bool dupReceived        = false;
00085     bool dataChunkReceived  = false;
00086     bool dataChunkDelivered = false;
00087     bool shutdownCalled     = false;
00088     for (uint32 i = 0; i < numberOfChunks; i++) {
00089         const SCTPChunk* header = (const SCTPChunk*)(sctpmsg->removeChunk());
00090         const uint8       type  = header->getChunkType();
00091 
00092         if ((type != INIT) &&
00093              (type != ABORT) &&
00094              (type != ERRORTYPE) &&
00095              (sctpmsg->getTag() != peerVTag)) {
00096             sctpEV3 << " VTag "<< sctpmsg->getTag() << " incorrect. Should be "
00097                       << peerVTag << " localVTag=" << localVTag << endl;
00098             return true;
00099         }
00100 
00101         switch (type) {
00102         case INIT:
00103             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: INIT received" << endl;
00104             SCTPInitChunk* initChunk;
00105             initChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPInitChunk*>(header);
00106             if ((initChunk->getNoInStreams() != 0) &&
00107                  (initChunk->getNoOutStreams() != 0) &&
00108                  (initChunk->getInitTag() != 0)) {
00109                 trans = processInitArrived(initChunk, srcPort, destPort);
00110             }
00111             i = numberOfChunks-1;
00112             delete initChunk;
00113             break;
00114         case INIT_ACK:
00115             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: INIT_ACK received" << endl;
00116             if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_WAIT) {
00117                 SCTPInitAckChunk* initAckChunk;
00118                 initAckChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPInitAckChunk*>(header);
00119                 if ((initAckChunk->getNoInStreams() != 0) &&
00120                     (initAckChunk->getNoOutStreams() != 0) &&
00121                     (initAckChunk->getInitTag() != 0)) {
00122                     trans = processInitAckArrived(initAckChunk);
00123                 }
00124                 else if (initAckChunk->getInitTag() == 0) {
00125                     sendAbort();
00126                     sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
00127                 }
00128                 i = numberOfChunks-1;
00129                 delete initAckChunk;
00130             }
00131             else {
00132                 sctpEV3 << "INIT_ACK will be ignored" << endl;
00133             }
00134             break;
00135         case COOKIE_ECHO:
00136             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: COOKIE_ECHO received" << endl;
00137             SCTPCookieEchoChunk* cookieEchoChunk;
00138             cookieEchoChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPCookieEchoChunk*>(header);
00139             trans = processCookieEchoArrived(cookieEchoChunk,src);
00140             delete cookieEchoChunk;
00141             break;
00142         case COOKIE_ACK:
00143             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: COOKIE_ACK received" << endl;
00144             if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_ECHOED) {
00145                 SCTPCookieAckChunk* cookieAckChunk;
00146                 cookieAckChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPCookieAckChunk*>(header);
00147                 trans = processCookieAckArrived();
00148                 delete cookieAckChunk;
00149             }
00150             break;
00151         case DATA:
00152             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: DATA received" << endl;
00153             if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_ECHOED) {
00154                 trans = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_COOKIE_ACK);
00155             }
00156             if (!(fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_RECEIVED || fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_ACK_SENT)) {
00157                 SCTPDataChunk* dataChunk;
00158                 dataChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPDataChunk*>(header);
00159                 if ((dataChunk->getByteLength()- 16) > 0) {
00160                     const SCTPEventCode event = processDataArrived(dataChunk);
00161                     if (event == SCTP_E_DELIVERED) {
00162                         dataChunkReceived    = true;
00163                         dataChunkDelivered = true;
00164                         state->sackAllowed = true;
00165                     }
00166                     else if (event==SCTP_E_SEND || event==SCTP_E_IGNORE) {
00167                         dataChunkReceived    = true;
00168                         state->sackAllowed = true;
00169                     }
00170                     else if (event==SCTP_E_DUP_RECEIVED) {
00171                         dupReceived = true;
00172                     }
00173                 }
00174                 else {
00175                     sendAbort();
00176                     sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
00177                 }
00178                 delete dataChunk;
00179             }
00180             trans = true;
00181             break;
00182         case SACK:
00183         {
00184             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: SACK received" << endl;
00185             const int32 scount = qCounter.roomSumSendStreams;
00186             SCTPSackChunk* sackChunk;
00187             sackChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPSackChunk*>(header);
00188             processSackArrived(sackChunk);
00189             trans           = true;
00190             sendAllowed = true;
00191             delete sackChunk;
00192             if (getOutstandingBytes()==0 && transmissionQ->getQueueSize()==0 && scount==0) {
00193                 if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_PENDING) {
00194                     sctpEV3 << "No more packets: send SHUTDOWN" << endl;
00195                     sendShutdown();
00196                     trans               = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_NO_MORE_OUTSTANDING);
00197                     shutdownCalled = true;
00198                 }
00199                 else if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_RECEIVED) {
00200                     sctpEV3 << "No more outstanding" << endl;
00201                     sendShutdownAck(remoteAddr);
00202                 }
00203             }
00204             break;
00205         }
00206         case ABORT:
00207             SCTPAbortChunk* abortChunk;
00208             abortChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPAbortChunk*>(header);
00209             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: ABORT with T-Bit "
00210                       << abortChunk->getT_Bit() << " received" << endl;
00211             if (sctpmsg->getTag() == localVTag || sctpmsg->getTag() == peerVTag) {
00212                 sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_ABORT);
00213                 trans = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_ABORT);
00214             }
00215             delete abortChunk;
00216             break;
00217         case HEARTBEAT:
00218             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: HEARTBEAT received" << endl;
00219             SCTPHeartbeatChunk* heartbeatChunk;
00220             heartbeatChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPHeartbeatChunk*>(header);
00221             if (!(fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_CLOSED)) {
00222                 sendHeartbeatAck(heartbeatChunk, dest, src);
00223             }
00224             trans = true;
00225             delete heartbeatChunk;
00226             break;
00227         case HEARTBEAT_ACK:
00228             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: HEARTBEAT_ACK received" << endl;
00229             if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_ECHOED) {
00230                 trans = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_COOKIE_ACK);
00231             }
00232             SCTPHeartbeatAckChunk* heartbeatAckChunk;
00233             heartbeatAckChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPHeartbeatAckChunk*>(header);
00234             if (path) {
00235                 processHeartbeatAckArrived(heartbeatAckChunk, path);
00236             }
00237             trans = true;
00238             delete heartbeatAckChunk;
00239             break;
00240         case SHUTDOWN:
00241             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: SHUTDOWN received" << endl;
00242             SCTPShutdownChunk* shutdownChunk;
00243             shutdownChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPShutdownChunk*>(header);
00244             if (shutdownChunk->getCumTsnAck()>state->lastTsnAck) {
00245                 simtime_t rttEstimation = MAXTIME;
00246                 dequeueAckedChunks(shutdownChunk->getCumTsnAck(),
00247                                          getPath(remoteAddr), rttEstimation);
00248                 state->lastTsnAck = shutdownChunk->getCumTsnAck();
00249             }
00250             trans = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_SHUTDOWN);
00251             sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_SHUTDOWN_RECEIVED);
00252             trans = true;
00253             delete shutdownChunk;
00254             break;
00255         case SHUTDOWN_ACK:
00256             sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: SHUTDOWN_ACK received" << endl;
00257             if (fsm->getState()!=SCTP_S_ESTABLISHED) {
00258                 SCTPShutdownAckChunk* shutdownAckChunk;
00259                 shutdownAckChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPShutdownAckChunk*>(header);
00260                 sendShutdownComplete();
00261                 stopTimers();
00262                 stopTimer(T2_ShutdownTimer);
00263                 stopTimer(T5_ShutdownGuardTimer);
00264                 sctpEV3 << "state=" << stateName(fsm->getState()) << endl;
00265                 if ((fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_SENT) ||
00266                      (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_ACK_SENT)) {
00267                     trans = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_SHUTDOWN_ACK);
00268                     sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CLOSED);
00269                     delete state->shutdownChunk;
00270                 }
00271                 delete shutdownAckChunk;
00272             }
00273             break;
00274         case SHUTDOWN_COMPLETE:
00275             sctpEV3<<"Shutdown Complete arrived" << endl;
00276             SCTPShutdownCompleteChunk* shutdownCompleteChunk;
00277             shutdownCompleteChunk = check_and_cast<SCTPShutdownCompleteChunk*>(header);
00278             trans = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_SHUTDOWN_COMPLETE);
00279             sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_PEER_CLOSED);     // necessary for NAT-Rendezvous
00280             if (trans == true) {
00281                 stopTimers();
00282             }
00283             stopTimer(T2_ShutdownTimer);
00284             stopTimer(T5_ShutdownGuardTimer);
00285             delete state->shutdownAckChunk;
00286             delete shutdownCompleteChunk;
00287             break;
00288         default: sctpEV3<<"different type" << endl;
00289             break;
00290         }
00291 
00292         if (i==numberOfChunks-1 && (dataChunkReceived || dupReceived)) {
00293             sendAllowed=true;
00294             sctpEV3 << "i=" << i << " sendAllowed=true; scheduleSack" << endl;
00295             scheduleSack();
00296             if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_SENT && state->ackState>=sackFrequency) {
00297                 sendSack();
00298             }
00299         }
00300 
00301         // Send any new DATA chunks, SACK chunks, HEARTBEAT chunks etc.
00302         sctpEV3 << "SCTPAssociationRcvMessage: send new data? state=" << stateName(fsm->getState())
00303                   << " sendAllowed="        << sendAllowed
00304                   << " shutdownCalled=" << shutdownCalled << endl;
00305         if (((fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_ESTABLISHED) ||
00306               (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_PENDING) ||
00307               (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_RECEIVED)) &&
00308              (sendAllowed) &&
00309              (!shutdownCalled)) {
00310             sendOnAllPaths(state->getPrimaryPath());
00311         }
00312     }
00313 
00314     // ====== Clean-up =======================================================
00315     disposeOf(state->sctpmsg);
00316     return trans;
00317 }
00318 
00319 bool SCTPAssociation::processInitArrived(SCTPInitChunk* initchunk, int32 srcPort, int32 destPort)
00320 {
00321     SCTPAssociation* assoc;
00322     char timerName[128];
00323     bool trans = false;
00324     InterfaceTableAccess interfaceTableAccess;
00325     AddressVector adv;
00326     sctpEV3<<"processInitArrived\n";
00327     if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_CLOSED)
00328     {
00329         sctpEV3<<"fork="<<state->fork<<" initReceived="<<state->initReceived<<"\n";
00330         if (state->fork && !state->initReceived)
00331         {
00332             sctpEV3<<"cloneAssociation\n";
00333             assoc = cloneAssociation();
00334             sctpEV3<<"addForkedAssociation\n";
00335             sctpMain->addForkedAssociation(this, assoc, localAddr, remoteAddr, srcPort, destPort);
00336 
00337             sctpEV3 << "Connection forked: this connection got new assocId=" << assocId << ", "
00338                 "spinoff keeps LISTENing with assocId=" << assoc->assocId << "\n";
00339             snprintf(timerName, sizeof(timerName), "T2_SHUTDOWN of assoc %d", assocId);
00340             T2_ShutdownTimer->setName(timerName);
00341             snprintf(timerName, sizeof(timerName), "T5_SHUTDOWN_GUARD of assoc %d", assocId);
00342             T5_ShutdownGuardTimer->setName(timerName);
00343             snprintf(timerName, sizeof(timerName), "SACK_TIMER of assoc %d", assocId);
00344             SackTimer->setName(timerName);
00345             snprintf(timerName, sizeof(timerName), "T1_INIT of assoc %d", assocId);
00346             T1_InitTimer->setName(timerName);
00347         }
00348         else
00349         {
00350             sctpMain->updateSockPair(this, localAddr, remoteAddr, srcPort, destPort);
00351 
00352         }
00353         if (!state->initReceived)
00354         {
00355             state->initReceived = true;
00356             state->initialPrimaryPath = remoteAddr;
00357             state->setPrimaryPath(getPath(remoteAddr));
00358             if (initchunk->getAddressesArraySize()==0)
00359             {
00360                 sctpEV3<<__LINE__<<" get new path for "<<remoteAddr<<"\n";
00361                 SCTPPathVariables* rPath = new SCTPPathVariables(remoteAddr, this);
00362                 sctpPathMap[rPath->remoteAddress] = rPath;
00363                 qCounter.roomTransQ[rPath->remoteAddress]     = 0;
00364                 qCounter.bookedTransQ[rPath->remoteAddress] = 0;
00365                 qCounter.roomRetransQ[rPath->remoteAddress] = 0;
00366             }
00367             initPeerTsn=initchunk->getInitTSN();
00368             state->cTsnAck = initPeerTsn - 1;
00369             state->initialPeerRwnd = initchunk->getA_rwnd();
00370             state->peerRwnd = state->initialPeerRwnd;
00371             localVTag= initchunk->getInitTag();
00372             numberOfRemoteAddresses =initchunk->getAddressesArraySize();
00373             IInterfaceTable *ift = interfaceTableAccess.get();
00374             state->localAddresses.clear();
00375             if (localAddressList.front() == IPvXAddress("0.0.0.0"))
00376             {
00377                 for (int32 i=0; i<ift->getNumInterfaces(); ++i)
00378                 {
00379                     if (ift->getInterface(i)->ipv4Data()!=NULL)
00380                     {
00381                         adv.push_back(ift->getInterface(i)->ipv4Data()->getIPAddress());
00382                     }
00383                     else if (ift->getInterface(i)->ipv6Data()!=NULL)
00384                     {
00385                         adv.push_back(ift->getInterface(i)->ipv6Data()->getAddress(0));
00386                     }
00387                 }
00388             }
00389             else
00390             {
00391                 adv = localAddressList;
00392             }
00393             uint32 rlevel = getLevel(remoteAddr);
00394             if (rlevel>0)
00395                 for (AddressVector::iterator i=adv.begin(); i!=adv.end(); ++i)
00396                 {
00397                     if (getLevel((*i))>=rlevel)
00398                     {
00399                         sctpMain->addLocalAddress(this, (*i));
00400                         state->localAddresses.push_back((*i));
00401                     }
00402                 }
00403             for (uint32 j=0; j<initchunk->getAddressesArraySize(); j++)
00404             {
00405                 // skip IPv6 because we can't send to them yet
00406                 if (initchunk->getAddresses(j).isIPv6())
00407                     continue;
00408                 // set path variables for this pathlocalAddresses
00409                 if (!getPath(initchunk->getAddresses(j)))
00410                 {
00411                     SCTPPathVariables* path = new SCTPPathVariables(initchunk->getAddresses(j), this);
00412                     sctpEV3<<__LINE__<<" get new path for "<<initchunk->getAddresses(j)<<" ptr="<<path<<"\n";
00413                     for (AddressVector::iterator k=state->localAddresses.begin(); k!=state->localAddresses.end(); ++k)
00414                     {
00415                         sctpMain->addRemoteAddress(this,(*k), initchunk->getAddresses(j));
00416                         this->remoteAddressList.push_back(initchunk->getAddresses(j));
00417                     }
00418                     sctpPathMap[path->remoteAddress] = path;
00419                     qCounter.roomTransQ[path->remoteAddress]     = 0;
00420                     qCounter.bookedTransQ[path->remoteAddress] = 0;
00421                     qCounter.roomRetransQ[path->remoteAddress] = 0;
00422                 }
00423             }
00424             SCTPPathMap::iterator ite=sctpPathMap.find(remoteAddr);
00425             if (ite==sctpPathMap.end())
00426             {
00427                 SCTPPathVariables* path = new SCTPPathVariables(remoteAddr, this);
00428                 sctpEV3<<__LINE__<<" get new path for "<<remoteAddr<<" ptr="<<path<<"\n";
00429                 sctpPathMap[remoteAddr] = path;
00430                 qCounter.roomTransQ[remoteAddr]  = 0;
00431                 qCounter.bookedTransQ[remoteAddr] = 0;
00432                 qCounter.roomRetransQ[remoteAddr] = 0;
00433             }
00434             trans = performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_INIT);
00435             if (trans) {
00436                 sendInitAck(initchunk);
00437             }
00438         }
00439         else if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_CLOSED)
00440         {
00441             trans=performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_INIT);
00442             if (trans) {
00443                 sendInitAck(initchunk);
00444             }
00445         }
00446         else {
00447             trans = true;
00448         }
00449     }
00450     else if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_WAIT) //INIT-Collision
00451     {
00452         sctpEV3<<"INIT collision: send Init-Ack\n";
00453         sendInitAck(initchunk);
00454         trans=true;
00455     }
00456     else if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_ECHOED || fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_ESTABLISHED)
00457     {
00458         // check, whether a new address has been added
00459         bool addressPresent = false;
00460         for (uint32 j=0; j<initchunk->getAddressesArraySize(); j++)
00461         {
00462             if (initchunk->getAddresses(j).isIPv6())
00463                 continue;
00464             for (AddressVector::iterator k=remoteAddressList.begin(); k!=remoteAddressList.end(); ++k)
00465             {
00466                 if ((*k)==(initchunk->getAddresses(j)))
00467                 {
00468                     addressPresent = true;
00469                     break;
00470                 }
00471             }
00472             if (!addressPresent)
00473             {
00474                 sendAbort();
00475                 return true;
00476             }
00477         }
00478         sendInitAck(initchunk);
00479         trans=true;
00480     }
00481     else if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_ACK_SENT)
00482         trans = true;
00483     printSctpPathMap();
00484     return trans;
00485 }
00486 
00487 
00488 bool SCTPAssociation::processInitAckArrived(SCTPInitAckChunk* initAckChunk)
00489 {
00490     bool trans = false;
00491     if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_WAIT)
00492     {
00493         sctpEV3<<"State is COOKIE_WAIT, Cookie_Echo has to be sent\n";
00494         stopTimer(T1_InitTimer);
00495         state->initRexmitTimeout = SCTP_TIMEOUT_INIT_REXMIT;
00496         trans=performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_INIT_ACK);
00497         //delete state->initChunk; will be deleted when state ESTABLISHED is entered
00498         if (trans)
00499         {
00500             state->initialPrimaryPath = remoteAddr;
00501             state->setPrimaryPath(getPath(remoteAddr));
00502             initPeerTsn=initAckChunk->getInitTSN();
00503             localVTag= initAckChunk->getInitTag();
00504             state->cTsnAck = initPeerTsn - 1;
00505             state->initialPeerRwnd = initAckChunk->getA_rwnd();
00506             state->peerRwnd = state->initialPeerRwnd;
00507             remoteAddressList.clear();
00508             numberOfRemoteAddresses =initAckChunk->getAddressesArraySize();
00509             sctpEV3<<"number of remote addresses in initAck="<<numberOfRemoteAddresses<<"\n";
00510             for (uint32 j=0; j<numberOfRemoteAddresses; j++)
00511             {
00512                 if (initAckChunk->getAddresses(j).isIPv6())
00513                     continue;
00514                 for (AddressVector::iterator k=state->localAddresses.begin(); k!=state->localAddresses.end(); ++k)
00515                 {
00516                     if (!((*k).isUnspecified()))
00517                     {
00518                         sctpEV3<<"addPath "<<initAckChunk->getAddresses(j)<<"\n";
00519                         sctpMain->addRemoteAddress(this,(*k), initAckChunk->getAddresses(j));
00520                         this->remoteAddressList.push_back(initAckChunk->getAddresses(j));
00521                         addPath(initAckChunk->getAddresses(j));
00522                     }
00523                 }
00524             }
00525             SCTPPathMap::iterator ite=sctpPathMap.find(remoteAddr);
00526             if (ite==sctpPathMap.end())
00527             {
00528                 sctpEV3<<__LINE__<<" get new path for "<<remoteAddr<<"\n";
00529                 SCTPPathVariables* path = new SCTPPathVariables(remoteAddr, this);
00530                 sctpPathMap[remoteAddr] = path;
00531                 qCounter.roomTransQ[remoteAddr]  = 0;
00532                 qCounter.roomRetransQ[remoteAddr] = 0;
00533                 qCounter.bookedTransQ[remoteAddr] = 0;
00534             }
00535             inboundStreams   = ((initAckChunk->getNoOutStreams()<inboundStreams)?initAckChunk->getNoOutStreams():inboundStreams);
00536             outboundStreams = ((initAckChunk->getNoInStreams()<outboundStreams)?initAckChunk->getNoInStreams():outboundStreams);
00537             (this->*ssFunctions.ssInitStreams)(inboundStreams, outboundStreams);
00538             sendCookieEcho(initAckChunk);
00539         }
00540         startTimer(T1_InitTimer, state->initRexmitTimeout);
00541     }
00542     else
00543         sctpEV3<<"State="<<fsm->getState()<<"\n";
00544     printSctpPathMap();
00545     return trans;
00546 }
00547 
00548 
00549 
00550 bool SCTPAssociation::processCookieEchoArrived(SCTPCookieEchoChunk* cookieEcho, IPvXAddress addr)
00551 {
00552     bool trans = false;
00553     SCTPCookie* cookie = check_and_cast<SCTPCookie*>(cookieEcho->getStateCookie());
00554     if (cookie->getCreationTime()+(int32)sctpMain->par("validCookieLifetime")<simTime())
00555     {
00556         sctpEV3<<"stale Cookie: sendAbort\n";
00557         sendAbort();
00558         delete cookie;
00559         return trans;
00560     }
00561     if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_CLOSED)
00562     {
00563         if (cookie->getLocalTag()!=localVTag || cookie->getPeerTag() != peerVTag)
00564         {
00565             bool same=true;
00566             for (int32 i=0; i<32; i++)
00567             {
00568                 if (cookie->getLocalTieTag(i)!=state->localTieTag[i])
00569                 {
00570                     same = false;
00571                     break;
00572                 }
00573                 if (cookie->getPeerTieTag(i)!=state->peerTieTag[i])
00574                 {
00575                     same = false;
00576                     break;
00577                 }
00578             }
00579             if (!same)
00580             {
00581                 sendAbort();
00582                 delete cookie;
00583                 return trans;
00584             }
00585         }
00586         sctpEV3<<"State is CLOSED, Cookie_Ack has to be sent\n";
00587         trans=performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_VALID_COOKIE_ECHO);
00588         if (trans)
00589             sendCookieAck(addr);//send to address
00590     }
00591     else if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_ESTABLISHED || fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_WAIT || fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_ECHOED)
00592     {
00593         sctpEV3<<"State is not CLOSED, but COOKIE_ECHO received. Compare the Tags\n";
00594         // case A: Peer restarted, retrieve information from cookie
00595         if (cookie->getLocalTag()!=localVTag && cookie->getPeerTag() != peerVTag )
00596         {
00597             bool same=true;
00598             for (int32 i=0; i<32; i++)
00599             {
00600                 if (cookie->getLocalTieTag(i)!=state->localTieTag[i])
00601                 {
00602                     same = false;
00603                     break;
00604                 }
00605                 if (cookie->getPeerTieTag(i)!=state->peerTieTag[i])
00606                 {
00607                     same = false;
00608                     break;
00609                 }
00610             }
00611             if (same)
00612             {
00613                 localVTag = cookie->getLocalTag();
00614                 peerVTag = cookie->getPeerTag();
00615                 sendCookieAck(addr);
00616             }
00617         }
00618         // case B: Setup collision, retrieve information from cookie
00619         else if (cookie->getPeerTag()==peerVTag && (cookie->getLocalTag()!=localVTag || cookie->getLocalTag()==0))
00620         {
00621             localVTag = cookie->getLocalTag();
00622             peerVTag = cookie->getPeerTag();
00623             performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_VALID_COOKIE_ECHO);
00624             sendCookieAck(addr);
00625         }
00626         else if (cookie->getPeerTag()==peerVTag && cookie->getLocalTag()==localVTag)
00627         {
00628             sendCookieAck(addr); //send to address src
00629         }
00630         trans=true;
00631     }
00632     else
00633     {
00634         sctpEV3<<"State="<<fsm->getState()<<"\n";
00635         trans = true;
00636     }
00637     delete cookie;
00638     return trans;
00639 }
00640 
00641 bool SCTPAssociation::processCookieAckArrived()
00642 {
00643     bool trans=false;
00644 
00645     if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_COOKIE_ECHOED)
00646     {
00647         stopTimer(T1_InitTimer);
00648         trans=performStateTransition(SCTP_E_RCV_COOKIE_ACK);
00649         if (state->cookieChunk->getCookieArraySize()==0)
00650         {
00651                 delete state->cookieChunk->getStateCookie();
00652         }
00653         delete state->cookieChunk;
00654         return trans;
00655     }
00656     else
00657         sctpEV3<<"State="<<fsm->getState()<<"\n";
00658 
00659     return trans;
00660 }
00661 
00662 void SCTPAssociation::tsnWasReneged(SCTPDataVariables*       chunk,
00663                                                 const int                    type)
00664 {
00665 
00666 #ifdef PKT
00667     if (transmissionQ->getQueueSize() > 0) {
00668         for (SCTPQueue::PayloadQueue::iterator tq = transmissionQ->payloadQueue.begin();
00669               tq != transmissionQ->payloadQueue.end(); tq++) {
00670             if (tq->second->tsn > chunk->tsn) {
00671                 if (!transmissionQ->checkAndInsertChunk(chunk->tsn, chunk)) {
00672                     sctpEV3 << "tsnWasReneged: cannot add message/chunk (TSN="
00673                               << chunk->tsn <<") to the transmissionQ" << endl;
00674                 }
00675                 else {
00676                     chunk->enqueuedInTransmissionQ = true;
00677                     chunk->setNextDestination(chunk->getLastDestinationPath());
00678                     CounterMap::iterator q = qCounter.roomTransQ.find(chunk->getNextDestination());
00679                     q->second+=ADD_PADDING(chunk->len/8+SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH);
00680                     CounterMap::iterator qb=qCounter.bookedTransQ.find(chunk->getNextDestination());
00681                     qb->second+=chunk->booksize;
00682                     return;
00683                 }
00684             }
00685         }
00686     }
00687 #endif
00688     sctpEV3 << "TSN " << chunk->tsn << " has been reneged (type "
00689               << type << ")" << endl;
00690     unackChunk(chunk);
00691     if (chunk->countsAsOutstanding) {
00692         decreaseOutstandingBytes(chunk);
00693     }
00694     chunk->hasBeenReneged = true;
00695     chunk->gapReports        = 1;
00696     if (!chunk->getLastDestinationPath()->T3_RtxTimer->isScheduled()) {
00697         startTimer(chunk->getLastDestinationPath()->T3_RtxTimer,
00698                       chunk->getLastDestinationPath()->pathRto);
00699     }
00700 }
00701 
00702 
00703 
00704 
00705 SCTPEventCode SCTPAssociation::processSackArrived(SCTPSackChunk* sackChunk)
00706 {
00707     simtime_t            rttEstimation            = MAXTIME;
00708     bool                     ctsnaAdvanced            = false;
00709     SCTPPathVariables* path                       = getPath(remoteAddr);    // Path for *this* SACK!
00710     const uint64         arwnd                    = sackChunk->getA_rwnd();
00711     const uint32         tsna                         = sackChunk->getCumTsnAck();
00712     uint32               highestNewAck            = tsna;   // Highest newly acked TSN
00713     const uint16         numGaps                      = sackChunk->getNumGaps();
00714     bool                     getChunkFastFirstTime = true;
00715 
00716     // ====== Print some information =========================================
00717     sctpEV3 << "##### SACK Processing: TSNa=" << tsna << " #####" << endl;
00718     for(SCTPPathMap::iterator piter = sctpPathMap.begin(); piter != sctpPathMap.end(); piter++) {
00719         SCTPPathVariables* myPath = piter->second;
00720         sctpEV3 << "Path " << myPath->remoteAddress << ":\t"
00721                   << "outstanding="          << path->outstandingBytes << "\t"
00722                   << "T3scheduled="          << path->T3_RtxTimer->getArrivalTime() << " "
00723                   << (path->T3_RtxTimer->isScheduled() ? "[ok]" : "[NOT SCHEDULED]") << "\t"
00724                   << endl;
00725     }
00726 
00727 
00728 
00729     // ====== Initialize some variables ======================================
00730     for(SCTPPathMap::iterator piter = sctpPathMap.begin(); piter != sctpPathMap.end(); piter++) {
00731         SCTPPathVariables* myPath = piter->second;
00732         // T.D. 26.03.09: Remember outstanding bytes before this update
00733         // Values are necessary for updating the congestion window!
00734         myPath->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate = myPath->outstandingBytes;     // T.D. 14.11.09: Bugfix - copy from myPath, not from path!
00735         myPath->requiresRtx                      = false;
00736         myPath->lowestTSNRetransmitted       = false;
00737         myPath->findLowestTSN                    = true;
00738         myPath->gapAcksInLastSACK                = 0;
00739         myPath->gapNAcksInLastSACK               = 0;
00740         myPath->newlyAckedBytes                  = 0;
00741         if (myPath == path) {
00742             myPath->lastAckTime = simTime();
00743         }
00744     }
00745 
00746 
00747     // ====== Zero Window Probing ============================================
00748     if ( (state->zeroWindowProbing) && (arwnd > 0) ) {
00749         state->zeroWindowProbing = false;
00750     }
00751 
00752 
00753     // #######################################################################
00754     // #### Processing of CumAck                                                         ####
00755     // #######################################################################
00756 
00757     if (tsnGt(tsna, state->lastTsnAck)) {    // Handle new CumAck
00758         sctpEV3 << "===== Handling new CumAck for TSN " << tsna << " =====" << endl;
00759 
00760 
00761         // We have got new chunks acked, and our cum ack point is advanced ...
00762         // Depending on the parameter osbWithHeader ackedBytes are with or without the header bytes.
00763         // T.D. 23.03.09: path->newlyAckedBytes is updated in dequeueAckedChunks()!
00764         dequeueAckedChunks(tsna, path, rttEstimation); // chunks with tsn between lastTsnAck and tsna are removed from the transmissionQ and the retransmissionQ; outstandingBytes are decreased
00765 
00766         state->lastTsnAck = tsna;
00767         ctsnaAdvanced = true;
00768     }
00769     else if (tsnLt(tsna, state->lastTsnAck)) {
00770         sctpEV3 << "Stale CumAck (" << tsna << " < " << state->lastTsnAck << ")"
00771                   << endl;
00772         return SCTP_E_IGNORE;
00773     }
00774 
00775 
00776     // ====== Handle reneging ================================================
00777     if ((numGaps == 0) && (tsnLt(tsna, state->highestTsnAcked))) {
00778         // Reneging, type 0:
00779         // In a previous SACK, chunks up to highestTsnAcked have been acked.
00780         // This SACK contains a CumAck < highestTsnAcked
00781         //      => rereg TSNs from CumAck+1 to highestTsnAcked
00782         //      => new highestTsnAcked = CumAck
00783         sctpEV3 << "numGaps=0 && tsna " << tsna
00784                   << " < highestTsnAcked " << state->highestTsnAcked << endl;
00785         uint32 i = state->highestTsnAcked;
00786         while (i >= tsna + 1) {
00787             SCTPDataVariables* myChunk = retransmissionQ->getChunk(i);
00788             if(myChunk) {
00789                 if(chunkHasBeenAcked(myChunk)) {
00790                     tsnWasReneged(myChunk,
00791                                       0);
00792                 }
00793             }
00794             i--;
00795         }
00796         state->highestTsnAcked = tsna;
00797     }
00798 
00799 
00800     // #######################################################################
00801     // #### Processing of GapAcks                                                        ####
00802     // #######################################################################
00803 
00804     if ((numGaps > 0) && (!retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.empty()) ) {
00805         sctpEV3 << "===== Handling GapAcks after CumTSNAck " << tsna << " =====" << endl;
00806         sctpEV3 << "We got " << numGaps << " gap reports" << endl;
00807 
00808         // We got fragment reports... check for newly acked chunks.
00809         const uint32 queuedChunks = retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.size();
00810         sctpEV3 << "Number of chunks in retransmissionQ: " << queuedChunks
00811                   <<" highestGapStop: "  << sackChunk->getGapStop(numGaps-1)
00812                   <<" highestTsnAcked: " << state->highestTsnAcked << endl;
00813 
00814         // ====== Handle reneging =============================================
00815         // highest gapStop smaller than highestTsnAcked: there might have been reneging
00816         if (tsnLt(sackChunk->getGapStop(numGaps-1), state->highestTsnAcked)) {
00817             // Reneging, type 2:
00818             // In a previous SACK, chunks up to highestTsnAcked have been acked.
00819             // This SACK contains a last gap ack < highestTsnAcked
00820             //      => rereg TSNs from last gap ack to highestTsnAcked
00821             //      => new highestTsnAcked = last gap ack
00822             uint32 i = state->highestTsnAcked;
00823             while (i >= sackChunk->getGapStop(numGaps - 1) + 1) {
00824                 // ====== Looking up TSN in retransmission queue ================
00825                 SCTPDataVariables* myChunk = retransmissionQ->getChunk(i);
00826                 if(myChunk) {
00827                     if (chunkHasBeenAcked(myChunk)) {
00828                         sctpEV3 << "TSN " << i << " was found. It has been un-acked." << endl;
00829                         tsnWasReneged(myChunk,
00830                                           2);
00831                         sctpEV3 << "highestTsnAcked now " << state->highestTsnAcked << endl;
00832                     }
00833                 }
00834                 else {
00835                     sctpEV3 << "TSN " << i << " not found in retransmissionQ" << endl;
00836                 }
00837                 i--;
00838             }
00839             state->highestTsnAcked = sackChunk->getGapStop(numGaps - 1);
00840         }
00841 
00842         // ====== Looking for changes in the gap reports ======================
00843         sctpEV3 << "Looking for changes in gap reports" << endl;
00844         for (int32 key = 0;key < numGaps; key++) {
00845             const uint32 lo = sackChunk->getGapStart(key);
00846             const uint32 hi = sackChunk->getGapStop(key);
00847 
00848 
00849             // ====== Iterate over TSNs in gap reports =========================
00850             sctpEV3 << "Examine TSNs between " << lo << " and " << hi << endl;
00851             for (uint32 pos = lo; pos <= hi; pos++) {
00852                 SCTPDataVariables* myChunk = retransmissionQ->getChunkFast(pos, getChunkFastFirstTime);
00853                 if (myChunk) {
00854                     if(chunkHasBeenAcked(myChunk) == false) {
00855                         SCTPPathVariables* myChunkLastPath = myChunk->getLastDestinationPath();
00856                         assert(myChunkLastPath != NULL);
00857                         // T.D. 02.02.2010: This chunk has been acked newly.
00858                         //                        Let's process this new acknowledgement!
00859                         handleChunkReportedAsAcked(highestNewAck, rttEstimation, myChunk,
00860                                                             path /* i.e. the SACK path for RTT measurement! */);
00861                     }
00862                 }
00863             }
00864         }
00865         state->highestTsnAcked = sackChunk->getGapStop(numGaps-1);
00866 
00867         // ====== Examine chunks between the gap reports ======================
00868         // They might have to be retransmitted or they could have been removed
00869         uint32 lo = tsna;
00870         for (int32 key = 0; key < numGaps; key++) {
00871             const uint32 hi = sackChunk->getGapStart(key);
00872             for (uint32 pos = lo+1; pos <= hi - 1; pos++) {
00873                 SCTPDataVariables* myChunk = retransmissionQ->getChunkFast(pos, getChunkFastFirstTime);
00874                 if(myChunk) {
00875                     handleChunkReportedAsMissing(sackChunk, highestNewAck, myChunk,
00876                                                           path /* i.e. the SACK path for RTT measurement! */);
00877                 }
00878                 else {
00879                     sctpEV3 << "TSN " << pos << " not found in retransmissionQ" << endl;
00880                 }
00881             }
00882             lo = sackChunk->getGapStop(key);
00883         }
00884 
00885 
00886         // ====== Validity checks =============================================
00887     }
00888 
00889 
00890     // ====== Update Fast Recovery status, according to SACK =================
00891     updateFastRecoveryStatus(state->lastTsnAck);
00892 
00893     // ====== Update RTT measurement for newly acked data chunks =============
00894     sctpEV3 << simTime() << ": SACK: rtt=" << rttEstimation
00895               << ", path=" << path->remoteAddress << endl;
00896     pmRttMeasurement(path, rttEstimation);
00897 
00898 
00899 
00900     // #######################################################################
00901     // #### Receiver Window Management                                               ####
00902     // #######################################################################
00903 
00904     const uint32 osb = getOutstandingBytes();
00905     state->peerRwnd = arwnd - osb;
00906 
00907     // position of statement changed 20.07.05 I.R.
00908     if ((int32)(state->peerRwnd) < 0) {
00909         state->peerRwnd = 0;
00910     }
00911     if (state->peerRwnd > state->initialPeerRwnd) {
00912         state->peerRwnd = state->initialPeerRwnd;
00913     }
00914     if (arwnd == 1 || state->peerRwnd < state->swsLimit || arwnd == 0) {
00915         sctpEV3 << "processSackArrived: arwnd=" << arwnd
00916                   << " state->peerRwnd=" << state->peerRwnd
00917                   << " set peerWindowFull" << endl;
00918         state->peerWindowFull = true;
00919     }
00920     else
00921     {
00922         state->peerWindowFull    = false;
00923         state->zeroWindowProbing = false;
00924     }
00925 #ifdef PVIATE
00926     advancePeerTsn();
00927 #endif
00928 
00929     // ====== Need for zero-window probing? ==================================
00930     if(osb == 0) {
00931         if (arwnd == 0)
00932             state->zeroWindowProbing = true;
00933     }
00934 
00935 
00936     // #######################################################################
00937     // #### Congestion Window Management                                             ####
00938     // #######################################################################
00939 
00940     sctpEV3 << "Before ccUpdateBytesAcked: ";
00941     for(SCTPPathMap::iterator piter = sctpPathMap.begin(); piter != sctpPathMap.end(); piter++) {
00942         SCTPPathVariables* myPath    = piter->second;
00943         const IPvXAddress& myPathId = myPath->remoteAddress;
00944 
00945 
00946         if(myPath->newlyAckedBytes > 0) {
00947             // T.D. 07.10.2009: Only call ccUpdateBytesAcked() when there are
00948             //                        acked bytes on this path!
00949             const bool advanceWindow = myPath->newCumAck;
00950 
00951             sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC " << myPath->newlyAckedBytes
00952                       << " newly acked on path " << myPathId << ";"
00953                       << "\t->\tadvanceWindow="       << advanceWindow << endl;
00954 
00955             (this->*ccFunctions.ccUpdateBytesAcked)(myPath, myPath->newlyAckedBytes, advanceWindow);
00956         }
00957     }
00958 
00959     // ====== Update congestion windows on paths (handling decreases) ========
00960     sctpEV3 << "Before ccUpdateAfterSack with tsna=" << tsna << endl;
00961     // ccUpdateAfterSack() will iterate over all paths.
00962     (this->*ccFunctions.ccUpdateAfterSack)();
00963 
00964 
00965     // #######################################################################
00966     // #### Path Management                                                              ####
00967     // #######################################################################
00968 
00969     // ====== Need to stop or restart T3 timer? ==============================
00970     for(SCTPPathMap::iterator piter = sctpPathMap.begin(); piter != sctpPathMap.end(); piter++) {
00971         SCTPPathVariables* myPath    = piter->second;
00972         const IPvXAddress& myPathId = myPath->remoteAddress;
00973 
00974         if (myPath->outstandingBytes == 0) {
00975             // T.D. 07.01.2010: Only stop T3 timer when there is nothing more to send on this path!
00976             if(qCounter.roomTransQ.find(myPath->remoteAddress)->second == 0) {
00977                 // Stop T3 timer, if there are no more outstanding bytes.
00978                 stopTimer(myPath->T3_RtxTimer);
00979             }
00980         }
00981         else if (myPath->newCumAck) {
00982             stopTimer(myPath->T3_RtxTimer);
00983             startTimer(myPath->T3_RtxTimer, myPath->pathRto);
00984         }
00985         else {
00986             /* Also restart T3 timer, when lowest TSN is rtx'ed */
00987             if(myPath->lowestTSNRetransmitted == true) {
00988                 sctpEV3 << "Lowest TSN retransmitted => restart of T3 timer for path "
00989                             << myPathId << endl;
00990                 stopTimer(myPath->T3_RtxTimer);
00991                 startTimer(myPath->T3_RtxTimer, myPath->pathRto);
00992             }
00993         }
00994 
00995         // ====== Clear error counter if TSNs on path have been acked =========
00996         if (myPath->newlyAckedBytes > 0) {
00997             pmClearPathCounter(myPath);
00998         }
00999     }
01000 
01001 
01002 
01003     return SCTP_E_IGNORE;
01004 }
01005 
01006 
01007 void SCTPAssociation::handleChunkReportedAsAcked(uint32&                  highestNewAck,
01008                                                                  simtime_t&           rttEstimation,
01009                                                                  SCTPDataVariables* myChunk,
01010                                                                  SCTPPathVariables* sackPath)
01011 {
01012     SCTPPathVariables* myChunkLastPath = myChunk->getLastDestinationPath();
01013     if ( (myChunk->numberOfTransmissions == 1) &&
01014           (myChunk->hasBeenReneged == false) ) {
01015         if (myChunkLastPath == sackPath) {
01016             const simtime_t timeDifference = simTime() - myChunk->sendTime;
01017             if((timeDifference < rttEstimation) || (rttEstimation == -1.0)) {
01018                 rttEstimation = timeDifference;
01019             }
01020             sctpEV3 << simTime()          << " processSackArrived: computed rtt time diff == "
01021                       << timeDifference << " for TSN "<< myChunk->tsn << endl;
01022         }
01023     }
01024     if ( (myChunk->hasBeenAbandoned == false)    &&
01025           (myChunk->hasBeenReneged == false) ) {
01026         myChunkLastPath->newlyAckedBytes += (myChunk->booksize);
01027 
01028         sctpEV3 << simTime() << ": GapAcked TSN " << myChunk->tsn
01029                   << " on path " << myChunkLastPath->remoteAddress << endl;
01030 
01031         if (myChunk->tsn > highestNewAck) {
01032             highestNewAck = myChunk->tsn;
01033         }
01034         ackChunk(myChunk);
01035         if (myChunk->countsAsOutstanding) {
01036             decreaseOutstandingBytes(myChunk);
01037         }
01038         if (transmissionQ->getChunk(myChunk->tsn)) {      // I.R. 02.01.07
01039             sctpEV3 << "Found TSN " << myChunk->tsn << " in transmissionQ -> remote it" << endl;
01040             transmissionQ->removeMsg(myChunk->tsn);
01041             myChunk->enqueuedInTransmissionQ = false;
01042             CounterMap::iterator q = qCounter.roomTransQ.find(myChunk->getNextDestination());
01043             q->second -= ADD_PADDING(myChunk->len/8+SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH);
01044             CounterMap::iterator qb = qCounter.bookedTransQ.find(myChunk->getNextDestination());
01045             qb->second -= myChunk->booksize;
01046         }
01047         myChunk->gapReports = 0;
01048     }
01049 }
01050 
01051 
01052 void SCTPAssociation::handleChunkReportedAsMissing(const SCTPSackChunk*      sackChunk,
01053                                                                     const uint32                 highestNewAck,
01054                                                                     SCTPDataVariables*       myChunk,
01055                                                                     const SCTPPathVariables* sackPath)
01056 {
01057     SCTPPathVariables* myChunkLastPath = myChunk->getLastDestinationPath();
01058     sctpEV3 << "TSN " << myChunk->tsn << " is missing in gap reports (last "
01059               << myChunkLastPath->remoteAddress << ") ";
01060     if (!chunkHasBeenAcked(myChunk)) {
01061         sctpEV3 << "has not been acked, highestNewAck=" << highestNewAck
01062                   << " countsAsOutstanding=" << myChunk->countsAsOutstanding << endl;
01063         const uint32 chunkReportedAsMissing = (highestNewAck > myChunk->tsn) ? 1 : 0;
01064         if (chunkReportedAsMissing > 0) {
01065             // T.D. 15.04.09: Increase gapReports by chunkReportedAsMissing.
01066             // Fixed bug here: gapReports += chunkReportedAsMissing instead of gapReports = chunkReportedAsMissing.
01067             /*
01068             printf("GapReports for TSN %u [ret=%d,fast=%s] at t=%s:  %d --> %d by %d\n",
01069                         myChunk->tsn,
01070                         myChunk->numberOfRetransmissions,
01071                         (myChunk->hasBeenFastRetransmitted == true) ? "YES" : "no",
01072                         simTime().str().c_str(),
01073                         myChunk->gapReports,
01074                         myChunk->gapReports + chunkReportedAsMissing,
01075                         chunkReportedAsMissing);
01076             */
01077             myChunk->gapReports += chunkReportedAsMissing;
01078 
01079             myChunkLastPath->gapNAcksInLastSACK++;
01080 
01081             if (myChunk->gapReports >= state->numGapReports) {
01082                 bool fastRtx = false;
01083                 fastRtx = ((myChunk->hasBeenFastRetransmitted == false) &&
01084                               (myChunk->numberOfRetransmissions == 0));
01085                 if (fastRtx) {
01086 
01087                     // ====== Add chunk to transmission queue ========
01088                     SCTPQueue::PayloadQueue::iterator it = transmissionQ->payloadQueue.find(myChunk->tsn);
01089                     if (transmissionQ->getChunk(myChunk->tsn) == NULL) {
01090                         SCTP::AssocStat* assocStat = sctpMain->getAssocStat(assocId);
01091                         if(assocStat) {
01092                             assocStat->numFastRtx++;
01093                         }
01094                         myChunk->hasBeenFastRetransmitted = true;
01095 
01096                         sctpEV3 << simTime() << ": Fast RTX for TSN "
01097                                   << myChunk->tsn << " on path " << myChunk->getLastDestination() << endl;
01098                         myChunkLastPath->numberOfFastRetransmissions++;
01099 
01100                         myChunk->setNextDestination(getNextDestination(myChunk));
01101                         SCTPPathVariables* myChunkNextPath = myChunk->getNextDestinationPath();
01102                         assert(myChunkNextPath != NULL);
01103 
01104                         if (myChunk->countsAsOutstanding) {
01105                             decreaseOutstandingBytes(myChunk);
01106                         }
01107                         if (!transmissionQ->checkAndInsertChunk(myChunk->tsn, myChunk)) {
01108                             sctpEV3 << "Fast RTX: cannot add message/chunk (TSN="
01109                                       << myChunk->tsn << ") to the transmissionQ" << endl;
01110                         }
01111                         else    {
01112                             myChunk->enqueuedInTransmissionQ = true;
01113                             CounterMap::iterator q = qCounter.roomTransQ.find(myChunk->getNextDestination());
01114                             q->second += ADD_PADDING(myChunk->len/8+SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH);
01115                             CounterMap::iterator qb = qCounter.bookedTransQ.find(myChunk->getNextDestination());
01116                             qb->second += myChunk->booksize;
01117                         }
01118                         myChunkNextPath->requiresRtx = true;
01119                         if(myChunkNextPath->findLowestTSN == true) {
01120                             // TD 08.12.09: fixed detection of lowest TSN retransmitted
01121                             myChunkNextPath->lowestTSNRetransmitted = true;
01122                         }
01123                     }
01124                 }
01125             }
01126         }
01127         else {
01128             myChunk->hasBeenFastRetransmitted = false;
01129             sctpEV3 << "TSN " << myChunk->tsn << " countsAsOutstanding="
01130                         << myChunk->countsAsOutstanding << endl;
01131             if (highestNewAck > myChunk->tsn) {
01132                 myChunk->gapReports++;
01133             }
01134             myChunkLastPath->gapAcksInLastSACK++;
01135         }
01136         myChunkLastPath->findLowestTSN = false;
01137     }
01138     else {
01139         // Reneging, type 1:
01140         // A chunk in the gap blocks has been un-acked => reneg it.
01141                     tsnWasReneged(myChunk,
01142                                       1);
01143     }
01144 }
01145 
01146 
01147 uint32 SCTPAssociation::dequeueAckedChunks(const uint32       tsna,
01148                                                          SCTPPathVariables* sackPath,
01149                                                          simtime_t&           rttEstimation)
01150 {
01151     SCTP::AssocStat* assocStat                   = sctpMain->getAssocStat(assocId);
01152     uint32            newlyAckedBytes            = 0;
01153     uint64            sendBufferBeforeUpdate = state->sendBuffer;
01154 
01155     // Set it ridiculously high
01156     rttEstimation = MAXTIME;
01157 
01158     // Are there chunks in the retransmission queue ? If Yes -> check for dequeue.
01159     SCTPQueue::PayloadQueue::iterator iterator = retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.begin();
01160     while (iterator != retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.end()) {
01161         SCTPDataVariables* chunk = iterator->second;
01162         if (tsnGe(tsna, chunk->tsn)) {
01163             // Dequeue chunk, cause it has been acked
01164             if (transmissionQ->getChunk(chunk->tsn)) {
01165                 transmissionQ->removeMsg(chunk->tsn);
01166                 chunk->enqueuedInTransmissionQ = false;
01167                 CounterMap::iterator q = qCounter.roomTransQ.find(chunk->getNextDestination());
01168                 q->second -= ADD_PADDING(chunk->len/8+SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH);
01169                 CounterMap::iterator qb = qCounter.bookedTransQ.find(chunk->getNextDestination());
01170                 qb->second -= chunk->booksize;
01171             }
01172 
01173             chunk = retransmissionQ->getAndExtractChunk(chunk->tsn);
01174             state->sendBuffer -= chunk->len/8;
01175 
01176             SCTPPathVariables* lastPath = chunk->getLastDestinationPath();
01177             assert(lastPath != NULL);
01178 
01179             if (!chunkHasBeenAcked(chunk)) {
01180                 newlyAckedBytes += (chunk->booksize);
01181 
01182                 sctpEV3 << simTime() << ": CumAcked TSN " << chunk->tsn
01183                           << " on path " << chunk->getLastDestination() << endl;
01184 
01185                 lastPath->newlyAckedBytes += (chunk->booksize);
01186 
01187                 // T.D. 05.12.09: CumAck affects lastPath -> reset its T3 timer later.
01188                 lastPath->newCumAck = true;
01189             }
01190 
01191 
01192             if(assocStat) {
01193                 assocStat->ackedBytes += chunk->len/8;
01194             }
01195 
01196             if ((chunkHasBeenAcked(chunk) == false) && (chunk->countsAsOutstanding)) {
01197                 ackChunk(chunk);
01198                 if ((chunk->numberOfTransmissions == 1) && (chunk->getLastDestinationPath() == sackPath)) {
01199                     const simtime_t timeDifference = simTime() - chunk->sendTime;
01200                     if ((timeDifference < rttEstimation) || (rttEstimation == MAXTIME)) {
01201                         rttEstimation = timeDifference;
01202                     }
01203                 }
01204                 decreaseOutstandingBytes(chunk);
01205             }
01206             if (chunk->userData != NULL) {
01207                 delete chunk->userData;
01208             }
01209             delete chunk;
01210         }
01211         else {
01212             break;
01213         }
01214         iterator = retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.begin();
01215     }
01216 
01217     if(sendBufferBeforeUpdate != state->sendBuffer && state->sendBuffer < state->sendQueueLimit) {
01218         // T.D. 06.02.2010: Just send SCTP_I_SENDQUEUE_ABATED once, after all newly acked
01219         //                        chunks have been dequeued.
01220         // I.R. only send indication if the sendBuffer size has dropped below the sendQueueLimit
01221         assert(state->lastSendQueueAbated < simTime());
01222         state->appSendAllowed = true;
01223         sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tSCTP_I_SENDQUEUE_ABATED("
01224                   << sendBufferBeforeUpdate - state->sendBuffer << ") to refill buffer "
01225                   << state->sendBuffer << "/" << state->sendQueueLimit << endl;
01226         sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_SENDQUEUE_ABATED, sendBufferBeforeUpdate - state->sendBuffer);
01227         state->lastSendQueueAbated = simTime();
01228     }
01229 
01230     sctpEV3 << "dequeueAckedChunks(): newlyAckedBytes=" << newlyAckedBytes
01231               << ", rttEstimation=" << rttEstimation << endl;
01232 
01233     return (newlyAckedBytes);
01234 }
01235 
01236 
01237 
01238 SCTPEventCode SCTPAssociation::processDataArrived(SCTPDataChunk* dataChunk)
01239 {
01240     bool                     checkCtsnaChange = false;
01241     const uint32         tsn                    = dataChunk->getTsn();
01242     SCTPPathVariables* path                 = getPath(remoteAddr);
01243 
01244     state->newChunkReceived       = false;
01245     state->lastTsnReceived        = tsn;
01246     state->lastDataSourceAddress = remoteAddr;
01247 
01248     sctpEV3 << simTime() << " SCTPAssociation::processDataArrived TSN=" << tsn << endl;
01249     path->pathRcvdTSN->record(tsn);
01250 
01251     SCTPSimpleMessage* smsg = check_and_cast <SCTPSimpleMessage*>(dataChunk->decapsulate());
01252     dataChunk->setBitLength(SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH*8);
01253     dataChunk->encapsulate(smsg);
01254     const uint32 payloadLength = dataChunk->getBitLength()/8-SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH;
01255     sctpEV3 << "state->bytesRcvd=" << state->bytesRcvd << endl;
01256     state->bytesRcvd+=payloadLength;
01257     sctpEV3 << "state->bytesRcvd now=" << state->bytesRcvd << endl;
01258     SCTP::AssocStatMap::iterator iter=sctpMain->assocStatMap.find(assocId);
01259     iter->second.rcvdBytes+=dataChunk->getBitLength()/8-SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH;
01260 
01261     if (state->numGaps == 0) {
01262         state->highestTsnReceived = state->cTsnAck;
01263     }
01264     else {
01265         state->highestTsnReceived = state->gapStopList[state->numGaps-1];
01266     }
01267     if (state->stopReceiving) {
01268         return SCTP_E_IGNORE;
01269     }
01270 
01271     if (tsnLe(tsn, state->cTsnAck)) {
01272             sctpEV3 << "Duplicate TSN " << tsn << " (smaller than CumAck)" << endl;
01273             state->dupList.push_back(tsn);
01274             state->dupList.unique();
01275             delete check_and_cast <SCTPSimpleMessage*>(dataChunk->decapsulate());
01276             return SCTP_E_DUP_RECEIVED;
01277     }
01278 
01279 
01280     if ((int32)(state->localRwnd-state->queuedReceivedBytes) <= 0) {
01281         if (tsnGt(tsn, state->highestTsnReceived)) {
01282             return SCTP_E_IGNORE;
01283         }
01284         // changed 06.07.05 I.R.
01285         else if ((!tsnIsDuplicate(tsn)) &&
01286                     (tsn < state->highestTsnStored)) {
01287             if (!makeRoomForTsn(tsn, dataChunk->getBitLength()-SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH*8, dataChunk->getUBit())) {
01288                 delete check_and_cast <SCTPSimpleMessage*>(dataChunk->decapsulate());
01289                 return SCTP_E_IGNORE;
01290             }
01291         }
01292     }
01293     if (tsnGt(tsn, state->highestTsnReceived)) {
01294         sctpEV3 << "highestTsnReceived=" << state->highestTsnReceived
01295                   << " tsn=" << tsn << endl;
01296         state->highestTsnReceived = state->highestTsnStored = tsn;
01297         if (tsn == initPeerTsn) {
01298             state->cTsnAck = tsn;
01299         }
01300         else {
01301             sctpEV3 << "Update fragment list" << endl;
01302             checkCtsnaChange = updateGapList(tsn);
01303         }
01304         state->newChunkReceived = true;
01305     }
01306     else if (tsnIsDuplicate(tsn)) {
01307         // TSN value is duplicate within a fragment
01308         sctpEV3 << "Duplicate TSN " << tsn << " (copy)" << endl;
01309         state->dupList.push_back(tsn);
01310         state->dupList.unique();
01311         return SCTP_E_IGNORE;
01312     }
01313     else {
01314         checkCtsnaChange = updateGapList(tsn);
01315     }
01316     if (state->swsAvoidanceInvoked) {
01317         // swsAvoidanceInvoked => schedule a SACK to be sent at once in this case
01318         sctpEV3 << "swsAvoidanceInvoked" << endl;
01319         state->ackState = sackFrequency;
01320     }
01321 
01322     if (checkCtsnaChange) {
01323         advanceCtsna();
01324     }
01325     sctpEV3 << "cTsnAck=" << state->cTsnAck
01326               << " highestTsnReceived=" << state->highestTsnReceived << endl;
01327 
01328     SCTPEventCode event = SCTP_E_SEND;
01329     if (state->newChunkReceived) {
01330         SCTPReceiveStreamMap::iterator iter = receiveStreams.find(dataChunk->getSid());
01331         const int ret = iter->second->enqueueNewDataChunk(makeVarFromMsg(dataChunk));
01332         if (ret > 0) {
01333             state->queuedReceivedBytes+=payloadLength;
01334 
01335             event = SCTP_E_DELIVERED;
01336             if (ret < 3) {
01337                 sendDataArrivedNotification(dataChunk->getSid());
01338                 putInDeliveryQ(dataChunk->getSid());
01339             }
01340         }
01341         state->newChunkReceived = false;
01342     }
01343 
01344     return(event);
01345 }
01346 
01347 
01348 SCTPEventCode SCTPAssociation::processHeartbeatAckArrived(SCTPHeartbeatAckChunk* hback,
01349                                                                              SCTPPathVariables*     path)
01350 {
01351     /* hb-ack goes to pathmanagement, reset error counters, stop timeout timer */
01352     const IPvXAddress addr          = hback->getRemoteAddr();
01353     const simtime_t hbTimeField = hback->getTimeField();
01354     stopTimer(path->HeartbeatTimer);
01355     /* assume a valid RTT measurement on this path */
01356     simtime_t rttEstimation = simTime() - hbTimeField;
01357     pmRttMeasurement(path, rttEstimation);
01358     pmClearPathCounter(path);
01359     path->confirmed = true;
01360     path->lastAckTime = simTime();
01361     if (path->primaryPathCandidate == true) {
01362         state->setPrimaryPath(getPath(addr));
01363         path->primaryPathCandidate = false;
01364         if (path->pmtu < state->assocPmtu) {
01365             state->assocPmtu = path->pmtu;
01366         }
01367         path->ssthresh = state->peerRwnd;
01368         recordCwndUpdate(path);
01369         path->heartbeatTimeout = (double)sctpMain->par("hbInterval") + path->pathRto;
01370     }
01371 
01372     if (path->activePath == false) {
01373         sctpEV3 << "HB ACK arrived activePath=false. remoteAddress=" <<path->remoteAddress
01374                   << " initialPP=" << state->initialPrimaryPath << endl;
01375         path->activePath = true;
01376         if (state->reactivatePrimaryPath && path->remoteAddress == state->initialPrimaryPath) {
01377             state->setPrimaryPath(path);
01378         }
01379         sctpEV3 << "primaryPath now " << state->getPrimaryPathIndex() << endl;
01380     }
01381     sctpEV3 << "Received HB ACK chunk...resetting error counters on path " << addr
01382               <<", rttEstimation=" << rttEstimation << endl;
01383     path->pathErrorCount = 0;
01384     return SCTP_E_IGNORE;
01385 }
01386 
01387 
01388 
01389 void SCTPAssociation::process_TIMEOUT_INIT_REXMIT(SCTPEventCode& event)
01390 {
01391     if (++state->initRetransCounter > (int32)sctpMain->par("maxInitRetrans"))
01392     {
01393         sctpEV3 << "Retransmission count during connection setup exceeds " << (int32)sctpMain->par("maxInitRetrans") << ", giving up\n";
01394         sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CLOSED);
01395         sendAbort();
01396         sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
01397         return;
01398     }
01399     sctpEV3<< "Performing retransmission #" << state->initRetransCounter << "\n";
01400     switch(fsm->getState())
01401     {
01402         case SCTP_S_COOKIE_WAIT: retransmitInit(); break;
01403         case SCTP_S_COOKIE_ECHOED: retransmitCookieEcho(); break;
01404         default:     opp_error("Internal error: INIT-REXMIT timer expired while in state %s", stateName(fsm->getState()));
01405     }
01406     state->initRexmitTimeout *= 2;
01407     if (state->initRexmitTimeout > SCTP_TIMEOUT_INIT_REXMIT_MAX)
01408         state->initRexmitTimeout = SCTP_TIMEOUT_INIT_REXMIT_MAX;
01409     startTimer(T1_InitTimer,state->initRexmitTimeout);
01410 }
01411 
01412 void SCTPAssociation::process_TIMEOUT_SHUTDOWN(SCTPEventCode& event)
01413 {
01414 
01415     if (++state->errorCount > (uint32)sctpMain->par("assocMaxRetrans"))
01416     {
01417         sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CONN_LOST);
01418         sendAbort();
01419         sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
01420         return;
01421     }
01422 
01423     sctpEV3 << "Performing shutdown retransmission. Assoc error count now "<<state->errorCount<<" \n";
01424     if(fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_SENT)
01425     {
01426         retransmitShutdown();
01427     }
01428     else if (fsm->getState() == SCTP_S_SHUTDOWN_ACK_SENT)
01429         retransmitShutdownAck();
01430 
01431     state->initRexmitTimeout *= 2;
01432     if (state->initRexmitTimeout > SCTP_TIMEOUT_INIT_REXMIT_MAX)
01433         state->initRexmitTimeout = SCTP_TIMEOUT_INIT_REXMIT_MAX;
01434     startTimer(T2_ShutdownTimer,state->initRexmitTimeout);
01435 }
01436 
01437 
01438 void SCTPAssociation::process_TIMEOUT_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL(SCTPPathVariables* path, bool force)
01439 {
01440 
01441     sctpEV3<<"HB Interval timer expired -- sending new HB REQ on path "<<path->remoteAddress<<"\n";
01442     /* restart hb_send_timer on this path */
01443     stopTimer(path->HeartbeatIntervalTimer);
01444     stopTimer(path->HeartbeatTimer);
01445     path->heartbeatIntervalTimeout = (double)sctpMain->par("hbInterval") +  path->pathRto;
01446     path->heartbeatTimeout = path->pathRto;
01447     startTimer(path->HeartbeatIntervalTimer, path->heartbeatIntervalTimeout);
01448     if ((simTime() - path->lastAckTime > path->heartbeatIntervalTimeout/2) || path->forceHb)
01449     {
01450         sendHeartbeat(path);
01451         startTimer(path->HeartbeatTimer, path->heartbeatTimeout);
01452 
01453         path->forceHb = false;
01454     }
01455 }
01456 
01457 
01458 void SCTPAssociation::process_TIMEOUT_HEARTBEAT(SCTPPathVariables* path)
01459 {
01460     bool oldState;
01461 
01462     /* check if error counters must be increased */
01463       if (path->activePath)
01464       {
01465              state->errorCount++;
01466              path->pathErrorCount++;
01467 
01468              sctpEV3<<"HB timeout timer expired for path "<<path->remoteAddress<<" --> Increase Error Counters (Assoc: "<<state->errorCount<<", Path: "<<path->pathErrorCount<<")\n";
01469       }
01470 
01471     /* RTO must be doubled for this path ! */
01472     path->pathRto = (simtime_t)min(2 * path->pathRto.dbl(), sctpMain->par("rtoMax"));
01473     path->statisticsPathRTO->record(path->pathRto);
01474     /* check if any thresholds are exceeded, and if so, check if ULP must be notified */
01475     if (state->errorCount > (uint32)sctpMain->par("assocMaxRetrans"))
01476     {
01477         sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CONN_LOST);
01478         sendAbort();
01479         sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
01480         return;
01481     }
01482     else
01483     {
01484         /* set path state to INACTIVE, if the path error counter is exceeded */
01485         if (path->pathErrorCount >   (uint32)sctpMain->par("pathMaxRetrans"))
01486         {
01487             oldState = path->activePath;
01488             path->activePath = false;
01489             if (path == state->getPrimaryPath()) {
01490                 state->setPrimaryPath(getNextPath(path));
01491             }
01492             sctpEV3 << "pathErrorCount now "<< path->pathErrorCount
01493                       << "; PP now " << state->getPrimaryPathIndex() << endl;
01494         }
01495         /* then: we can check, if all paths are INACTIVE ! */
01496         if (allPathsInactive())
01497         {
01498             sctpEV3<<"sctp_do_hb_to_timer() : ALL PATHS INACTIVE --> closing ASSOC\n";
01499             sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CONN_LOST);
01500             return;
01501 
01502         } else if (path->activePath == false && oldState == true)
01503         {
01504             /* notify the application, in case the PATH STATE has changed from ACTIVE to INACTIVE */
01505             pathStatusIndication(path, false);
01506         }
01507 
01508     }
01509 }
01510 
01511 void SCTPAssociation::stopTimers()
01512 {
01513     for (SCTPPathMap::iterator j = sctpPathMap.begin(); j != sctpPathMap.end(); j++) {
01514         stopTimer(j->second->HeartbeatTimer);
01515         stopTimer(j->second->HeartbeatIntervalTimer);
01516     }
01517 }
01518 
01519 void SCTPAssociation::stopTimer(cMessage* timer)
01520 {
01521 
01522     ev << "stopTimer " << timer->getName() << endl;
01523     if (timer->isScheduled()) {
01524         cancelEvent(timer);
01525     }
01526 }
01527 
01528 void SCTPAssociation::startTimer(cMessage* timer, const simtime_t& timeout)
01529 {
01530     sctpEV3 << "startTimer " << timer->getName() << " with timeout "
01531               << timeout << " to expire at " << simTime() + timeout << endl;
01532     scheduleTimeout(timer, timeout);
01533 }
01534 
01535 
01536 
01537 int32 SCTPAssociation::updateCounters(SCTPPathVariables* path)
01538 {
01539     bool notifyUlp = false;
01540     if (++state->errorCount >=   (uint32)sctpMain->par("assocMaxRetrans"))
01541     {
01542         sctpEV3 << "Retransmission count during connection setup exceeds " << (int32)sctpMain->par("assocMaxRetrans") << ", giving up\n";
01543         sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CLOSED);
01544         sendAbort();
01545         sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
01546         return 0;
01547     }
01548     else if (++path->pathErrorCount >=  (uint32)sctpMain->par("pathMaxRetrans"))
01549     {
01550         if (path->activePath)
01551         {
01552             /* tell the source */
01553             notifyUlp = true;
01554         }
01555 
01556         path->activePath = false;
01557         if (path == state->getPrimaryPath()) {
01558             state->setPrimaryPath(getNextPath(path));
01559         }
01560         sctpEV3<<"process_TIMEOUT_RESET("<<(path->remoteAddress)<<") : PATH ERROR COUNTER EXCEEDED, path status is INACTIVE\n";
01561         if (allPathsInactive())
01562         {
01563             sctpEV3<<"process_TIMEOUT_RESET : ALL PATHS INACTIVE --> closing ASSOC\n";
01564             sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CONN_LOST);
01565             sendAbort();
01566             sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
01567             return 0;
01568         }
01569         else if (notifyUlp)
01570         {
01571             /* notify the application */
01572             pathStatusIndication(path, false);
01573         }
01574         sctpEV3<<"process_TIMEOUT_RESET("<<(path->remoteAddress)<<") : PATH ERROR COUNTER now "<<path->pathErrorCount<<"\n";
01575         return 2;
01576     }
01577     return 1;
01578 }
01579 
01580 
01581 
01582 int32 SCTPAssociation::process_TIMEOUT_RTX(SCTPPathVariables* path)
01583 {
01584     sctpEV3 << "Processing retransmission timeout ..." << endl;
01585 
01586     // ====== Increase the RTO (by doubling it) ==============================
01587     path->pathRto = min(2 * path->pathRto.dbl(), sctpMain->par("rtoMax"));
01588     path->statisticsPathRTO->record(path->pathRto);
01589     sctpEV3 << "Schedule T3 based retransmission for path "<< path->remoteAddress << endl;
01590 
01591     // ====== Update congestion window =======================================
01592     (this->*ccFunctions.ccUpdateAfterRtxTimeout)(path);
01593 
01594 
01595     // ====== Error Counter Handling =========================================
01596     if (!state->zeroWindowProbing) {
01597         state->errorCount++;
01598         path->pathErrorCount++;
01599         sctpEV3 << "RTX-Timeout: errorCount increased to "<<path->pathErrorCount<<"  state->errorCount="<<state->errorCount<<"\n";
01600     }
01601     if (state->errorCount >= (uint32)sctpMain->par("assocMaxRetrans")) {
01602         /* error counter exceeded terminate the association -- create an SCTPC_EV_CLOSE event and send it to myself */
01603 
01604         sctpEV3 << "process_TIMEOUT_RTX : ASSOC ERROR COUNTER EXCEEDED, closing ASSOC" << endl;
01605         sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CONN_LOST);
01606         sendAbort();
01607         sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
01608         return 0;
01609 
01610     }
01611     else {
01612         if (path->pathErrorCount >= (uint32)sctpMain->par("pathMaxRetrans")) {
01613             bool notifyUlp = false;
01614 
01615             sctpEV3 << "pathErrorCount exceeded\n";
01616             if (path->activePath) {
01617                 /* tell the source */
01618                 notifyUlp = true;
01619             }
01620             path->activePath = false;
01621             if (path->remoteAddress == state->getPrimaryPathIndex()) {
01622                 SCTPPathVariables* nextPath = getNextPath(path);
01623                 if (nextPath != NULL) {
01624                     state->setPrimaryPath(nextPath);
01625                 }
01626             }
01627             sctpEV3 << "process_TIMEOUT_RTX(" << path->remoteAddress
01628                       << ") : PATH ERROR COUNTER EXCEEDED, path status is INACTIVE" << endl;
01629             if (allPathsInactive()) {
01630                 sctpEV3 << "process_TIMEOUT_RTX: ALL PATHS INACTIVE --> connection LOST!" << endl;
01631                 sendIndicationToApp(SCTP_I_CONN_LOST);
01632                 sendAbort();
01633                 sctpMain->removeAssociation(this);
01634                 return 0;
01635             }
01636             else if (notifyUlp) {
01637                 // Send notification to the application
01638                 pathStatusIndication(path, false);
01639             }
01640         }
01641         sctpEV3 << "process_TIMEOUT_RTX(" << path->remoteAddress
01642                   << ") : PATH ERROR COUNTER now " << path->pathErrorCount << endl;
01643     }
01644 
01645 
01646     // ====== Do Retransmission ==============================================
01647     // dequeue all chunks not acked so far and put them in the TransmissionQ
01648     if (!retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.empty()) {
01649         sctpEV3 << "Still " << retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.size()
01650                   << " chunks in retransmissionQ" << endl;
01651 
01652         for (SCTPQueue::PayloadQueue::iterator iterator = retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.begin();
01653             iterator != retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.end(); iterator++) {
01654             SCTPDataVariables* chunk = iterator->second;
01655             assert(chunk != NULL);
01656 
01657             // ====== Insert chunks into TransmissionQ ============================
01658             // Only insert chunks that were sent to the path that has timed out
01659             if ( ((chunkHasBeenAcked(chunk) == false && chunk->countsAsOutstanding) || chunk->hasBeenReneged) &&
01660                   (chunk->getLastDestinationPath() == path) ) {
01661                 sctpEV3 << simTime() << ": Timer-Based RTX for TSN "
01662                           << chunk->tsn << " on path " << chunk->getLastDestination() << endl;
01663                 chunk->getLastDestinationPath()->numberOfTimerBasedRetransmissions++;
01664                 SCTP::AssocStatMap::iterator iter = sctpMain->assocStatMap.find(assocId);
01665                 iter->second.numT3Rtx++;
01666 
01667                 moveChunkToOtherPath(chunk, getNextDestination(chunk));
01668             }
01669         }
01670     }
01671 
01672 
01673     SCTPPathVariables* nextPath = getNextPath(path);
01674     sctpEV3 << "TimeoutRTX: sendOnAllPaths()" << endl;
01675     sendOnAllPaths(nextPath);
01676 
01677     return 0;
01678 }
01679 
01680 
01681 void SCTPAssociation::moveChunkToOtherPath(SCTPDataVariables* chunk,
01682                                                          SCTPPathVariables* newPath)
01683 {
01684     // ====== Prepare next destination =======================================
01685     SCTPPathVariables* lastPath = chunk->getLastDestinationPath();
01686     chunk->hasBeenFastRetransmitted = false;
01687     chunk->gapReports                     = 0;
01688     chunk->setNextDestination(newPath);
01689     sctpEV3 << simTime() << ": Timer-Based RTX for TSN " << chunk->tsn
01690               << ": lastDestination=" << chunk->getLastDestination()
01691               << " nextDestination="  << chunk->getNextDestination() << endl;
01692 
01693     // ======= Remove chunk's booksize from outstanding bytes ================
01694     // T.D. 12.02.2010: This case may happen when using sender queue control!
01695     if(chunk->countsAsOutstanding) {
01696         assert(lastPath->outstandingBytes >= chunk->booksize);
01697         lastPath->outstandingBytes -= chunk->booksize;
01698         assert((int32)lastPath->outstandingBytes >= 0);
01699         state->outstandingBytes -= chunk->booksize;
01700         assert((int64)state->outstandingBytes >= 0);
01701         chunk->countsAsOutstanding = false;
01702         // T.D. 12.02.2010: No Timer-Based RTX is necessary any more when there
01703         //                        are no outstanding bytes!
01704         if(lastPath->outstandingBytes == 0) {
01705             stopTimer(lastPath->T3_RtxTimer);
01706         }
01707     }
01708 
01709 
01710     // ====== Perform bookkeeping ============================================
01711     // Check, if chunk_ptr->tsn is already in transmission queue.
01712     // This can happen in case multiple timeouts occur in succession.
01713     if (!transmissionQ->checkAndInsertChunk(chunk->tsn, chunk)) {
01714         sctpEV3 << "TSN " << chunk->tsn << " already in transmissionQ" << endl;
01715         return;
01716     }
01717     else {
01718         chunk->enqueuedInTransmissionQ = true;
01719         sctpEV3 << "Inserting TSN " << chunk->tsn << " into transmissionQ" << endl;
01720         CounterMap::iterator q = qCounter.roomTransQ.find(chunk->getNextDestination());
01721         q->second += ADD_PADDING(chunk->len/8+SCTP_DATA_CHUNK_LENGTH);
01722         CounterMap::iterator qb = qCounter.bookedTransQ.find(chunk->getNextDestination());
01723         qb->second += chunk->booksize;
01724 
01725         if (chunk->countsAsOutstanding) {
01726             decreaseOutstandingBytes(chunk);
01727         }
01728         state->peerRwnd += (chunk->booksize);
01729     }
01730     if (state->peerRwnd > state->initialPeerRwnd) {
01731         state->peerRwnd = state->initialPeerRwnd;
01732     }
01733     sctpEV3 << "T3 Timeout: Chunk (TSN=" << chunk->tsn
01734                 << ") has been requeued in transmissionQ, rwnd was set to "
01735                 << state->peerRwnd << endl;
01736 }
